foreignData.name: Adeline, strahlende Katharerin
foreignData.text:
Wachsamkeit
Die Stärke von Adeline, strahlende Katharerin, ist gleich der Anzahl an Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst.
Immer wenn du angreifst, erzeuge für jeden Gegner einen getappten und angreifenden 1/1 weißen Mensch-Kreaturenspielstein, der jenen Spieler oder einen Planeswalker, den er kontrolliert, angreift.

foreignData.name: Adeline, cátara fulgurante
foreignData.text:
Vigilancia.
La fuerza de Adeline, cátara fulgurante es igual a la cantidad de criaturas que controlas.
Siempre que ataques, por cada oponente, crea una ficha de criatura Humano blanca 1/1 que está girada y atacando a ese jugador o a un planeswalker que controla.

foreignData.name: Adeline, cathare resplendissante
foreignData.text:
Vigilance
La force d'Adeline, cathare resplendissante est égale au nombre de créatures que vous contrôlez.
À chaque fois que vous attaquez, pour chaque adversaire, créez un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Humain qui est engagé et attaquant ce joueur ou un planeswalker qu'il contrôle.

foreignData.name: Adeline, Catara Splendente
foreignData.text:
Cautela
La forza di Adeline, Catara Splendente è pari al numero di creature che controlli.
Ogniqualvolta attacchi, per ogni avversario, crea una pedina creatura Umano 1/1 bianca TAPpata e che attacca quel giocatore o un planeswalker che controlla.

foreignData.name: 輝かしい聖戦士、エーデリン
foreignData.text:
警戒
輝かしい聖戦士、エーデリンのパワーは、あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャーの数に等しい。
あなたが攻撃するたび、対戦相手１人につき１体の白の１/１の人間・クリーチャー・トークンをタップ状態かつそのプレイヤーまたはそのプレイヤーがコントロールしているプレインズウォーカーを攻撃している状態で生成する。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・騎士

mainBoard.name: Adeline, Resplendent Cathar
mainBoard.originalText:
Vigilance
Adeline, Resplendent Cathar's power is equal to the number of creatures you control.
Whenever you attack, for each opponent, create a 1/1 white Human creature token that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control.

rulings.text: Although the Human tokens created by the triggered ability are attacking, they were never declared as attacking creatures (for the purposes of abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks, for example).
Attacking with any creatures will cause Adeline's last ability to trigger. Adeline doesn't have to be among them.
The ability that defines Adeline's power works in all zones, not just the battlefield. As long as Adeline is on the battlefield (and still a creature), that ability will count Adeline itself.
Tokens will be created for each of your opponents, not just opponents that you attacked.
You choose whether each token is attacking that opponent or a planeswalker they control as those tokens enter the battlefield.

mainBoard.name: Mentor of the Meek
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever another creature you control with power 2 or less enters, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

rulings.text: If a creature enters with +1/+1 counters or a continuous effect such as that of Wedding Festivity will apply to the creature on the battlefield, those effects apply when checking to see if Mentor of the Meek’s ability will trigger.

Mentor of the Meek’s ability checks the power of the other creature only as it enters. If that creature’s power is 2 or less, the ability will trigger. Once the ability triggers, raising that creature’s power above 2 won’t affect that ability. Similarly, reducing the creature’s power to 2 or less after it enters won’t cause the ability to trigger.
While resolving the triggered ability of Mentor of the Meek, you can’t pay {1} multiple times to draw more than one card.

mainBoard.name: Ancestral Blade
mainBoard.originalText:
When Ancestral Blade enters, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token, then attach Ancestral Blade to it.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

rulings.text: If the triggered ability causes two Soldiers to be created (due to an effect such as that of Doubling Season), Ancestral Blade becomes attached to one of them.
No player may take any actions between the time you create the Soldier token and the time Ancestral Blade becomes attached to it.

The Soldier token that you create enters the battlefield as a 1/1 creature. Any abilities that trigger when a creature with a certain power enters the battlefield will see the token enter as a 1/1 creature. Static abilities that affect the Soldier's power and toughness may change this, but Ancestral Blade will be attached to the Soldier before the game checks to see if it has toughness 0 or less. For example, if Illness in the Ranks ("Creature tokens get -1/-1") is on the battlefield, the Soldier will enter as a 0/0 creature, but then Ancestral Blade will make it a 1/1 and the token will survive.

mainBoard.name: Dauntless Unity
mainBoard.originalText:
Kicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} as you cast this spell.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, those creatures get +2/+1 until end of turn instead.

rulings.text: If a card or token enters as a copy of a permanent, the new permanent isn't kicked, even if the original was.
If a spell's kicker cost was paid, the spell is "kicked."
If you copy a kicked spell on the stack, the copy is also kicked. If the copied spell is a permanent spell, the token the copy of that spell becomes when it enters is also kicked.
If you put a permanent with a kicker ability onto the battlefield without casting it, you can't kick it.
The kicker ability doesn't let you pay a kicker cost more than once.

To determine a spell's total cost, start with the mana cost (or an alternative cost if another card's effect allows you to pay one instead), add any cost increases (such as kicker), then apply any cost reductions. The spell's mana value remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

mainBoard.text:

foreignData.flavorText: „Alle, die auf dieser Liste stehen, sind bereits Helden! Soll ich auch deinen Namen eintragen?"
foreignData.name: Rekrutierungsoffizierin
foreignData.text: {3}{W}: Schaue dir die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst davon eine Kreaturenkarte mit Manabetrag 3 oder weniger offen vorzeigen und sie auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest in zufälliger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.flavorText: "¡Todos los que hayan anotado su nombre en esta lista ya son héroes! ¿Quieres añadir el tuyo?".
foreignData.name: Oficial de alistamiento
foreignData.text: {3}{W}: Mira las cuatro primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes mostrar una carta de criatura con valor de maná de 3 o menos de entre ellas y ponerla en tu mano. Pon el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en un orden aleatorio.

foreignData.flavorText: « Chaque nom sur cette liste est déjà celui d'un héros ! Y ajouterez-vous le vôtre ? »
foreignData.name: Recruteuse militaire
foreignData.text: {3}{W} : Regardez les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez révéler une carte de créature avec une valeur de mana inférieure ou égale à 3 parmi elles et la mettre dans votre main. Mettez le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque dans un ordre aléatoire.

foreignData.flavorText: "Ogni nome in questa lista è già un eroe! Aggiungerete anche il vostro?"
foreignData.name: Ufficiale di Reclutamento
foreignData.text: {3}{W}: Guarda le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi rivelare una carta creatura con valore di mana pari o inferiore a 3 scelta tra esse e aggiungerla alla tua mano. Metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in ordine casuale.

foreignData.flavorText: 「このリストに名を記した時点で、誰もが英雄だ！君もその名をここに連ねてみないか？」
foreignData.name: 徴兵士官
foreignData.text: {3}：あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード４枚を見る。「その中からマナ総量が３以下であるクリーチャー・カード１枚を公開し、あなたの手札に加える。」を選んでもよい。残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に無作為の順番で置く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

mainBoard.name: Recruitment Officer
mainBoard.originalText: {3}{W}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with mana value 3 or less from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
mainBoard.text: {3}{W}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with mana value 3 or less from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Werewolves leave messy trails. Easy to follow. Hard to forget."

foreignData.flavorText: „Werwölfe hinterlassen deutliche Spuren. Leicht zu verfolgen. Schwer zu vergessen."
foreignData.name: Hauptmann des Suchtrupps
foreignData.text:
Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Wirken für jede Kreatur, die du in diesem Zug als Angreifer deklariert hast, {1} weniger.
Wenn der Hauptmann des Suchtrupps ins Spiel kommt, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: "Los licántropos dejan rastros turbulentos. Son fáciles de seguir, pero difíciles de olvidar".
foreignData.name: Capitán del equipo de búsqueda
foreignData.text:
Te cuesta {1} menos lanzar este hechizo por cada criatura con la que atacaste este turno.
Cuando el Capitán del equipo de búsqueda entre, roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: « Les loups-garous laissent des pistes répugnantes. Faciles à suivre. Difficiles à oublier. »
foreignData.name: Capitaine de l'équipe de recherche
foreignData.text:
Ce sort coûte {1} de moins à lancer pour chaque créature avec laquelle vous avez attaqué ce tour-ci.
Quand le Capitaine de l'équipe de recherche arrive, piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: "I mannari lasciano tracce disordinate. Facili da seguire. Difficili da dimenticare."
foreignData.name: Capitano della Squadra di Ricerca
foreignData.text:
Questa magia costa {1} in meno per essere lanciata per ogni creatura con cui hai attaccato in questo turno.
Quando il Capitano della Squadra di Ricerca entra, pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 「人狼は乱雑な手掛かりを残す。追跡しやすいが、なかなか忘れる事ができない。」
foreignData.name: 捜索隊の隊長
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるためのコストは、このターンにあなたが攻撃させたクリーチャー１体につき{1}少なくなる。
捜索隊の隊長が戦場に出たとき、カード１枚を引く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

mainBoard.name: Search Party Captain
mainBoard.originalText:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you attacked with this turn.
When Search Party Captain enters, draw a card.
mainBoard.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you attacked with this turn.
When this creature enters, draw a card.

mainBoard.flavorText: Wildflowers here bloom not with the season but with the ebb and flow of magic.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Blüte der Wildblumen richtet sich hier nicht nach den Jahreszeiten, sondern nach den Gezeiten der Magie.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Heide
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Heide kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie sie ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Weiß.
{T}: Erzeuge {W} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Las flores salvajes de aquí no florecen según las estaciones, sino según los altibajos y el flujo de la magia.
foreignData.name: Brezal floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Brezal floreciente entra girado. En cuanto entre, elige un color que no sea blanco.
{T}: Agrega {W} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: Ici, les fleurs sauvages s'épanouissent non pas au gré des saisons mais au gré des flux de magie.
foreignData.name: Prairie prospère
foreignData.text:
La Prairie prospère arrive engagée. Au moment où elle arrive, choisissez une couleur autre que le blanc.
{T} : Ajoutez {W} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: I fiori selvatici qui non sbocciano in base alle stagioni, ma seguendo il fluire della magia.
foreignData.name: Brughiera Florida
foreignData.text:
La Brughiera Florida entra TAPpata. Mentre entra, scegli un colore diverso dal bianco.
{T}: Aggiungi {W} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 季節ではなく魔法の干満に従って野生の花が咲く。
foreignData.name: 興隆する荒野
foreignData.text:
興隆する荒野はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、白でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{W}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

mainBoard.name: Thriving Heath
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Heath enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
